info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Garfield County through 515 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near De Beque, or 30 miles northeast of Grand Junction, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Garfield County, including the following locations... Battlement Mesa. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 61 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
